name: UAVHQ
description: This is a large project that I am currently working on. It’s a website for a drone racing business. It’s still under development and not hosted yet. It’s a full-stack project. I used Sass, jQuery, Bootstrap to build the front-end. We plan to use Laravel (a PHP framework) for back-end development.

name: Stout Global
description: Stout Global is a Content Management System created for users to create user-generated content (UGC). I designed and developed this project for my master thesis. It has a front-page to display UGC and a back-end dashboard for users to create content. In this project, I used PHP to develop the server-side logic and MySQL to insert data into the database. JavaScript and CSS were used to render the data fetched from the database. Feel free to use this username (Juez1986) and password (TBVc!dD6AE8MdPm) to login into the dashboard and try something out.

name: Cinematography Site
description: A client found me said that there are many features that he wants to improve with his existing website. So, I improved the responsive design and animation within the splash page. I also built an admin tool for the client to upload his video. This tool is written by PHP and MySQL. Finally, I improved the design of the film page to exactly match the client’s design.

name: Portfolio Site
description: An interactive website built for an educator/artist. The project shows off his portfolio as two different roles. I used a different navigation layout in this project, and there are many interactive elements. The technology stacks include jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

name: Interactive Map
description: An interactive map created to present a user interface concept. Users can interact with a map by choosing different transportation options. Also, they can toggle the night mode. I used jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS in this project.
